description: Make this elliptical the perfect fitness gift for a parent or grandparent. This compact elliptical machine is approachable for all ages to use. A great pedal exerciser for seniors, those rehabilitating, or those looking to burn extra calories
features: UMAY Desk Elliptical: Work while workout, Your go-to mini ellipse leg exerciser for seamless workouts or rehabilitation, right from the comfort of your home or office chair. Whether you're working, reading or watching TV, transform your sitting time into an opportunity for exercise with this innovative pedal exerciser. Burn calories, lose weight, and feel great with elliptical machines for home use

Auto & Manual Modes: UMAY elliptical provides Auto & Manual Modes for you, elderly people can choose 1-4 levels of low speed for leg exercise and relaxation. In Manual mode, you can set workout time of 15-30min, 12 speeds and forward&backward direction by remote control or button of the elliptical machine. The speed and direction have been programmed in Auto mode, you can adjust P1-P12 mode by press mode button, the speed changes every minute and the direction changes every 3 minutes

Forward & Backward: More targeted exercising the front & back of ankle and thigh muscles to boost circulation. The LCD monitor tracks time, diatance, counts and calories burned in real-time. and comes with a remote control to control the machine, allowing you to adjust it without bending over. It is perfect for the elderly and people with limited mobility. Please do not standing up use the elliptical machine

Mute Setting: UAMY pedal exerciser equipped with the latest mute system<15dB, which ensures a ultra quiet workout even at a high speed for you worry free use. When plugged in, long press the Power button to turn off the screen, and long press the Direction button on the machine for 1.5 seconds. After two beeps, cancel the sound prompt, and follow the same steps to restore normal sound

Perfect Gift Companion: For elders, nothing is more precious than health. It can be an ideal gift for parents or grandparents, encouraging regular use to ensure proper leg blood circulation and muscle health. This pedal exerciser is equipped with a quieter and smoother mute system, ensuring noise-free exercise even at high speeds. It allows you to exercise anytime, anywhere without disturbing your colleagues or family members

UMAYCARE SERVICE: Our California-based team provides complete after-sales and technical support, ensuring any issues with your order or product use are resolved to your satisfaction. From shipping damage and parts issues to product usage, installation, and maintenance, we're here to offer tailored solutions for you

【20+ YEARS OF EXCELLENCE】 Sunny Health & Fitness, a U.S. company, offers top-quality equipment with a commitment to excellence. Our dedicated U.S. customer service team and certified trainers ensure a truly unmatched fit-for-everyone experience.

title: Life Fitness E5 Cross Trainer Elliptical Exercise Machine with Go Console, Titanium
inStockText: Only 2 left in stock - order soon.  Only 1 left in stock - order soon.
breadCrumbs: Sports & Outdoors › Exercise & Fitness › Cardio Training › Elliptical Trainers
description: The E5 Adjustable-Strike Elliptical Cross-Trainer is a versatile home exercise machine for effective total-body workouts. The stride adjusts from 18" to 24" with the push of a button and multigrip handles let exercisers work different muscle groups. The smooth and natural feeling ellipse path of the E5 Cross-Trainer is based on years of biomechanics research. The E5 Adjustable-Stride Elliptical Cross-Trainer has an adjustable stride and several other features that create effective low-impact, total-body workouts tailored to fit any exerciser.
features: ADJUSTABLE STRIDE - Stride adjusts electronically from 18" to 24" so exerciser can choose from a variety of challenging and effective workouts with SMOOTH NATURAL MOTION - Extensive biomechanical research is used to create a fluid motion with an elliptical path that feels natural and comfortable. Also comes with WHISPERSTRIDE TECHNOLOGY Maintenance-free ball bearings reduce friction and ensure nearly silent operation, which is ideal for home use.

APPEALING VARIETY - Multigrip handles contain heart rate sensors, with integrated stride and resistance controls for on the fly adjustments, allow for varying exercise motions. The system also includes telemetry heart rate monitoring (wireless chest strap included with console)

CONNECTED EXPERIENCE - Enable Bluetooth on your mobile device to push data to a growing list of partner apps. Sync with many fitness devices by enabling proximity login on the LFconnect app. Or, connect to interactive apps for an engaging workout experience.

DUAL-ZONE DESIGN 1. ENTERTAINMENT ZONE - Placed at eye level for an ideal viewing experience. The compression rack securely holds all smartphones and tablets, even those with a protective case. 2. WORKOUT ZONE - The lower half of the console offers convenient workout setup and in-workout control. It features capacitive touch keys that illuminate when usable and dim when not in use.

SPECIFICATIONS - Includes Activity Zone that targets specific muscle groups with LegSculptor and Total Body Trainer workouts. Has a 18-24 inch stride length that is electronically adjustable and contains 2 cup holders. Integrated moving arm features - multi-grip to enable choosing most comfortable hand grip. Max user weight is 400 pounds. Contains 20 electro-magnetic resistance levels.

The Go Console combines ease of use with a variety of engaging and motivating workout programs. Intuitive functionality with a simple, attractive design and eye-catching blue LCD screen makes it great for exercisers looking for a straightforward experience.

From the manufacturer

E5 Elliptical Cross-Trainer. 
About Life Fitness 
For more than 50 years, Life Fitness has been dedicated to creating fitness solutions that benefit both facilities and exercisers. Our mission to keep people active started with the Lifecycle exercise bike and continues with the widest range of cardio, strength and group training products in the fitness industry. 
E5 Elliptical Cross-Trainer Elliptical With Go Console 
By Life Fitness 
The E5 Adjustable-Strike Elliptical Cross-Trainer is a versatile home exercise machine for effective total-body workouts. The stride adjusts from 18" to 24" with the push of a button and multi-grip handles let exercisers work different muscle groups. The smooth and natural feeling ellipse path of the E5 Cross-Trainer is based on years of biomechanics research.

Heart Rate Monitoring - Contact heart rate sensors on moving multigrip handles and stationary grips, telemetry heart rate monitoring (wireless chest strap included with console).

What are the benefits of this under desk elliptical for the body? 
The Ellipse Leg Exerciser benefit the body by enhancing cardiovascular health, improving endurance, burning calories, aiding weight control, and reducing discomfort from prolonged sitting, effectively improving overall health and quality of life. 
What are the significant characteristics of our elliptical machine compared to traditional elliptical machines? 
This stair stepper effectively exercises the legs and supports comprehensive full-body training. Using auxiliary elastic ropes targets upper body muscles, improving cardiovascular health and making it an ideal choice for exercise equipment. 
How is the pedal design of the leg exercise machine? 
Our elliptical machine features floating shock-absorption pedals and anti-slip foot straps. The pedals promote blood circulation in the feet, reduce impact, and ensure smoother workouts. The foot straps secure both feet, enhancing convenience. 
Is this elliptical training machines noisy? Will it affect my work? 
The elliptical machine is equipped with an advanced magnetic resistance system and a sturdy base, ensuring quiet operation, allowing you to enjoy your workout without worries. 
Who is suitable for using Mysuntown elliptical? 
The stepper is suitable for individuals looking to increase daily activity, improve health conditions, or reduce physical stress, especially those who spend long hours sitting at a desk, helping to alleviate bodily stiffness.

Best Home Fitness for Your Family 
-Exercising is great way to control your weight, improving your fitness and reduce the effect of aging and stress. The key to success is to make exercise a regular and enjoyable part of your everyday life. 
-The condition of your heart and lungs and how efficient they are in delivering oxygen via your blood to your muscles is an important factor to your fitness. Your muscles use this oxygen to provide enough energy for daily activity. This is called aerobic activity. When you are fit, your heart will not have to work so hard. It will pump a lot fewer times per minute, reducing the wear and tear of your heart. 
So as you can see, the fitter you are, the healthier and greater you will feel. 
-Start each workout with 5 to 10 minutes of stretching and some light exercises. A proper warm-up Increases your body temperature, heart rate and circulation in preparation for exercise. Ease into your exercise. 
Build a Healthy Life
More Happy Sports Time with Family
Balance the Ground 
Unlike other elliptical machines, we can adjust the balance. Even if the road surface is uneven, the balance can be adjusted by adjusting the knob. 
Assemble in Minutes 
The manufacturer has pre-built 90% of the elliptical machine. The rest part can finish assembling within half an hour. 
Easy Moving 
Using these convenient transport wheels to transform your home into your own private fitness room. Just tilt and roll out to use or store, and the wheels on the front of the unit allow the user to easily move the bike to a room or store it out of sight. 
Exactly Data Tracking 
An easy to read large window LCD display your distance, calories burned, time, speed, scan and target zone heart rate monitoring. Aerobic exercise increases cardio respiratory fitness, Natural elliptical motion reduces stress on joints. 
22 Magnetic Resistance 
Adjustable resistance, use convenient tension knob to adjust exercise intensity. With simple turns, you can increase or decrease resistance so that your workout is always challenging and effective throughout the entire fitness process. Using this tool, users can participate in different and unique programs in each exercise to stimulate muscles in different ways and create new training modes. 
Large Footboard 
Large cushioned footplates contribute to comfortable, low-impact workouts.8 Level magnetic tension resistance adjustments can provide the user with a more challenging workout. And built-in effective Inertia-enhanced flywheel delivers a more natural ride. Your workout will also be quiet and smooth.

title: MERACH Elliptical Exercise Machine Trainer for Home with 16.5IN Stride, Hyper-Quiet Magnetic Driving System with 16 Resistance Levels, Multi-Function Display, Heart Rate Monitor Exercise Equipment
breadCrumbs: Sports & Outdoors › Exercise & Fitness › Cardio Training › Elliptical Trainers
features: Stride Length (16.5IN) for Workouts: The MERACH Elliptical Exercise Machine offers a 16.5IN stride length, ensuring a comfortable and customizable workout for users of all sizes. Whether you're focusing on low-impact cardio or engaging in an intense full-body workout, this adjustable stride length allows for a personalized exercise experience, making it ideal for both beginners and seasoned athletes.

Hyper-Quiet Magnetic Drive System for a Silent Workout: Experience the ultimate in quiet, smooth, and efficient workouts with the hyper-quiet magnetic drive system. Unlike traditional ellipticals with noisy friction-based resistance, this innovative system ensures a virtually silent workout, making it perfect for home gyms, apartments, or any environment where noise reduction is a priority. Enjoy a peaceful session without disturbing your family or neighbors.

16 Resistance Levels for Progressive Training: With 16 resistance levels, this elliptical allows you to gradually increase workout intensity as you build strength and endurance. Whether you’re a beginner or an advanced athlete, the MERACH elliptical offers resistance settings that cater to every fitness goal—from low-impact cardio to intense muscle toning. Challenge yourself as you progress and unlock new levels of fitness.

Multi-Function Display with Real-Time Metrics: Track your fitness progress with ease using the multi-function display. This large LCD screen shows critical workout stats such as time, speed, distance, calories burned, and heart rate. Stay on top of your fitness goals and monitor your performance in real time to optimize your workout routine. With this feature, you can maintain motivation and achieve better results faster.

Built-In Heart Rate Monitor for Optimal Training: The built-in heart rate monitor allows you to keep track of your heart rate throughout your workout. This feature helps you stay within your target heart rate zone for optimal fat-burning and cardiovascular conditioning. By monitoring your pulse, you can adjust your workout intensity to meet specific fitness objectives and ensure you’re getting the most out of every session.

Space-Saving, Sturdy, and Durable Construction: The MERACH Elliptical is designed with durability and convenience in mind. Its compact and sturdy frame fits seamlessly into small spaces, making it an ideal choice for home gyms or apartments with limited room. Despite its compact size, the elliptical offers superior stability during exercise, ensuring a safe and solid workout experience every time.

Low-Impact Full-Body Workout for All Fitness Levels: This elliptical machine is perfect for individuals seeking a low-impact workout that reduces stress on the joints while still delivering effective results. Whether you’re recovering from an injury or want to avoid high-impact exercises, the MERACH elliptical provides a smooth, natural motion that targets the legs, glutes, arms, and core, helping you tone and strengthen your entire body.

Convenient Foot Pedals for Comfort & Safety: The non-slip foot pedals are ergonomically designed for comfort and safety, ensuring that your feet stay securely in place throughout your workout. The pedals are large and cushioned, providing a comfortable surface that reduces foot fatigue during long sessions. Whether you’re walking, jogging, or sprinting, these pedals ensure a secure, enjoyable experience.

Easy Assembly & User-Friendly Design: Setting up the MERACH Elliptical is quick and hassle-free. The machine is designed with an easy assembly process, making it user-friendly even for those who are not familiar with fitness equipment setup. Once assembled, the intuitive control panel and display provide an effortless workout experience, allowing you to focus on achieving your fitness goals.

Ideal for Weight Loss, Toning, and Cardiovascular Health: Whether you’re aiming for weight loss, muscle toning, or improving your cardiovascular health, the MERACH Elliptical Exercise Machine is versatile enough to help you achieve all these goals. The combination of adjustable resistance, low-impact motion, and full-body engagement makes this machine perfect for burning calories, toning muscles, and boosting overall fitness.

Whether you're at home, in the office, or even watching TV, this machine allows you to engage your leg muscles and burn calories effortlessly. This ellipse leg exerciser targets your leg muscles and provides a low-impact workout that is gentle on your joints. With its motorized feature, you can enjoy a hands-free leg exercise experience while sitting comfortably. Ideal for seniors who want to maintain their mobility and strengthen their legs.Don't let age hold you back from staying active and fit. FUNMILY pedal exerciser for seniors is specifically designed to meet the needs of older adults. With multiple work modes and a user-friendly interface, this exerciser allows you to customize your workout and gradually increase intensity. It's a great way to improve leg strength, flexibility, and overall fitness.Invest in your health and well-being with our FUNMILY Leg Exercise Pro Machine!

title: Sunny Health & Fitness Compact Performance Recumbent Bike w/Dual Motion Arm/Leg Exercisers for Senior Home Training w/Quick Adjust Seat & Optional Exclusive Free SunnyFit App Bluetooth Connectivity
breadCrumbs: Sports & Outdoors › Exercise & Fitness › Cardio Training › Exercise Bikes
features: 【LOW IMPACT DESIGN】Our recumbent elliptical bike enhances cardio health and strength while safeguarding joints. Tailored for low impact, it ensures a smooth, engaging workout experience. Prioritize your fitness without compromising joint health.

【FULL-BODY EXERCISE】Engage multiple muscle groups effectively by utilizing both the moveable handles and elliptical-sized foot pedals. For a targeted burn and specific upper or lower body workouts, versatile fitness tailored to your needs.

【MAGNETIC RESISTANCE】Experience ultimate control with our recumbent elliptical bike featuring 8 levels of smooth magnetic resistance. Easily adjust intensity for the perfect workout challenge tailored to your fitness goals.
【SMOOTH & QUIET】Featuring a belt-drive mechanism, our recumbent elliptical bike exerciser ensures minimal friction and noise disturbance, allowing for undisturbed workouts.

【FREE CONNECTED APP】 Enjoy FREE access to the SunnyFit App with every Sunny Health & Fitness product—no membership fees! Dive into 1,000+ trainer-led workouts, explore 10,000+ virtual scenic tours, track your progress, challenge others, and much more!

【RIDE WITH COMFORT】Enjoy extra wide, cushioned, and adjustable seat. Non-slip handlebars and textured footplates keep you secure. Easy on-off design for hassle-free transitions. Minimal obstruction allows safe stepping through.

【DIGITAL MONITOR】Monitor your fitness journey with precision: time, speed, RPM, distance, calories, heart rate, and resistance on the digital monitor & pulse sensors on seat handlebars. Keep entertained by securing your device in the central holder.

【EASY-TRANSPORTION】Our elliptical bike, weighing 86 LB and measuring 63" x 48" x 28.9", features effortlessly relocate your machine using user-friendly transportation wheels for convenient storage when not in use.

【SOLID BUILT】Utilize floor stabilizers for secure positioning during intense workouts. Made from premium alloy steel and durable plastic, our recumbent bike ensures reliable daily performance. 3-year warranty on structural frame & 180 days parts.

【20+ Years Of Excellence】As a premier brand, Sunny Health & Fitness delivers top-notch equipment dedicated to excellence. With our devoted support team and certified trainers, enjoy an unmatched FIT FOR EVERYONE experience.

aPlusContent.rawText:
Product Description
The video showcases the product in use.The video guides you through product setup.The video compares multiple products.The video shows the product being unpacked.
CONNECTED FITNESS 
With Bluetooth, this recumbent elliptical connects to the SunnyFit app and allows you to access an array of free workouts and fitness programs. 
EASILY TRANSPORTABLE 
U Move your machine to your desired location with the easy-to-use transportation wheels, so you can store it out of the way when not in use. 
FULL BODY WORKOUT 
Work various muscle groups in both your upper and lower body by simultaneously using the moveable handles and elliptical-sized foot pedals. 
EASY ON AND OFF 
With minimal obstruction between the handlebars and the seat, you can step through your machine and sit down safely before starting your workout. 
MAGNETIC RESISTANCE 
8 Levels of smooth and adjustable magnetic resistance makes it easy to modify intensity to deliver the perfect workout challenge. 
COMFORTABLE RIDE 
The large, cushioned, and easily adjustable seat provides comfort throughout each workout. 
PERFORMANCE MONITOR 
Track various metrics during each workout. View your time, speed, RPM, distance, Watts, calories, and resistance on the digital performance monitor. 
DEVICE HOLDER 
Stay entertained and stream your favorite TV show, or dial in your exercise session with a trainer-led workout in the SunnyFit app while working out. 
What is the max user weight for this product 
This product has a recommended user weight limit of 265 lb. 
How many resistance levels does this have? 
This has 8 levels of resistance, easily to modify with the dial. 
How much does this product weigh? 
This elliptical weighs 86 lbs after assembly. 
Are workout programs available with this product? 
This product can connect to our SunnyFit app with Bluetooth. Gain access to free training programs by professional trainers with other community members.

aPlusContent.title: Product Description
aPlusContent.rawText:
Product Description
Customizable Balance Adjustment 
Our elliptical machine offers a unique advantage - the ability to adjust the balance. This means that even if the road surface is uneven, you can adjust the balance by simply turning the knob to ensure a stable and secure workout experience. 
Quick and Easy Assembly 
Our elliptical machine is designed to be assembled in minutes. The manufacturer has pre-built 95% of the equipment, and the remaining parts can be easily assembled in under half an hour. 
Easy to Move 
Transform your home into your own private fitness room with our convenient transport wheels. Simply tilt and roll out to use or store the equipment. The front wheels allow you to easily move the bike to any room or store it out of sight when not in use. 
Accurate Data Tracking 
With a clear and readable large LCD display, keep track of your distance, calories burned, time, speed, scan, and monitor your heart rate in your target zone. The elliptical motion is natural and easy on your joints, while aerobic exercise boosts your cardio respiratory fitness. 
22 Levels of Magnetic Resistance 
Easily adjust the resistance to your desired intensity with a convenient tension knob. With simple turns, you can increase or decrease the resistance, ensuring that your workout remains challenging and effective throughout your entire fitness journey. This versatile tool allows you to participate in various unique exercise programs, stimulating your muscles in different ways and creating new training modes. 
Spacious Footboard 
Enjoy comfortable and low-impact workouts with our large cushioned footplates. You can increase the intensity of your workout with 8 level magnetic tension resistance adjustments. The built-in effective inertia-enhanced flywheel provides a natural ride, ensuring that your workout is quiet and smooth.

aPlusContent.title: Product Description
aPlusContent.rawText:
Product Description
Jailbreak your Fitness Equipment!! 
Get connected with FreeSync with FTMS Bluetooth exclusively offered by 3G Cardio. 
Don’t get handcuffed by your exercise equipment! FreeSync allows you to turn your tablet or mobile device into a fully interactive electronic display for free using FTMS Bluetooth. 
Enjoy an interactive experience by choosing different Play Store apps from Android and Apple for Zwift or Kino Maps (some apps require monthly memberships) and let your tablet or mobile device become your fully functional, fully interactive electronic display. 
FreeSync allows your device to change elevation or resistance, send and receive workout data and best of all, if you get bored with an app from the Google Play Store or Apple Store, simply find a new app and move on! 
3G Cardio Elite EM X Elliptical Trainer 
Do You Know How to Shop for an Elliptical? We do. 
Size Does Matter! 
The reality is that ellipticals can take up little space, and we have proof! The compact, space-saving 3G Cardio EM X Elliptical is built like a tank with a fully adjustable stride from 18” to 23”. And best of all, the footprint is a mere 49” in length! Amazing. 
And the feel... 
We use a patented, roller-less stride mechanism that allows for maximum smoothness and reduced wear and tear. In other words, our elliptical will feel as smooth as glass. 
The best part of all? 
You can use this elliptical machine for casual walking or as a running machine! The perfect design for all types of users. A low 8” rear entry, soft pedal step-up height, easy-to-reach dual hand grips, easy-to-use upper electronics, and no membership required! 
Console Features 
FreeSync FTMS HD Smart Connect Bluetooth 4.0 
Dual interactive handheld heart rate grips and non-coded wireless contact heart rate strap included. 
Standard Readouts 
SPEED, RPM, TIME, DISTANCE, CALORIES, WATT, LEVEL, PULSE 
Built-in Programs: 
MANUAL, GLUTE BLAST, PHYSICAL, RAMP, PLATEAU CLIMB, MOUNTAIN CLIMB 1, FITNESS TEST, IRON MAN, MOUNTAIN CLIMB 2, FAT BURN, HILL CLIMB, VALLEY, INTERVAL, H.R.C. (55%, 75%, 90%, T.H.R.), WATT CONTROL, USER 
Highlights 
Easy-to-Read LCD Back-Lit Display 
Forward & Reverse Motions 
32 Resistance Levels 
19 Built-in Programs 
USB Charging Port 
Tablet Shelf 
Commercial Grade but Built for Anyone! 
Built Like a Tank 
Unique Triangular Engineered Base Steel Frame for Added Durability
Adjustable Floor Levelers on Front and Rear Stabilizer Feet
Large Transportation Wheels on the Front
Upper Body Handles 
Steel High Density Foam Construction
Dual Interactive & Multi Position
Drive System 
Silent Magnetic Resistance System
Commercial 2-Pulley Drive Wheel System with V-Belt
Internal Assembly Joints Fitted with Double Commercial Bearings
Commercial 26.4 lb Flywheel
With more than 60 years of combined experience in the health and fitness industry, our mission is simple, yet innovative. 
Our Arizona-based company’s “simple by design” philosophy means that we provide everything a person needs when it comes to fitness equipment — and nothing they don’t. 
The emphasis is on the longevity & functionality of our fitness machines, not on fancy electronic “extras” or forcing our customers into monthly subscription fees. We still include outstanding entertainment and programming options, which can easily be upgraded with iPads or tablets, but we don’t add the unnecessary “bells and whistles”. 
We work hard every day to always exceed your expectations! 
3G Cardio Family

modules.title: Jailbreak your Fitness Equipment!!   Get connected with FreeSync with FTMS Bluetooth exclusively offered by 3G Cardio.
modules.text:
Don’t get handcuffed by your exercise equipment! FreeSync allows you to turn your tablet or mobile device into a fully interactive electronic display for free using FTMS Bluetooth. 
Enjoy an interactive experience by choosing different Play Store apps from Android and Apple for Zwift or Kino Maps (some apps require monthly memberships) and let your tablet or mobile device become your fully functional, fully interactive electronic display. 
FreeSync allows your device to change elevation or resistance, send and receive workout data and best of all, if you get bored with an app from the Google Play Store or Apple Store, simply find a new app and move on!

description: Elliptical Machine, Dripex Magnetic Elliptical Exercise Machine for Home, Quiet & Smooth Elliptical Trainer w/ 8KG Flywheel, 15.3IN Stride, 16 Levels Resistance, LCD Monitor, Pulse Sensor
features: 【Heavy-duty Construction Design】Dripex Elliptical machine is crafted with premium materials, our light commercial elliptical machine ensures longevity even under frequent use. Its sturdy construction guarantees stability and minimal maintenance, making it a cost-effective choice for home and light commercial settings. The 105LBS mainframe provides secure support for users up to 330LBS

【15.3IN Stride & Low-Impact Workout】Dripex elliptical exercise machine features a precisely engineered magnetic system that provides a smooth and quiet workout. The 15.3IN natural stride and the 17.6LBS rear flywheel design result in a fluid movement that minimizes stress on your knees, and fits heights up to 6'4"; The Low-impact workout allows you to focus on burning calories and enhancing your cardiovascular health without discomfort

【16 Adjustable Resistance Levels】This Dripex Elliptical machine for home is equipped with 16-level Magnetic Resistance that caters to diverse fitness goals. Whether you're a beginner or a professional or aiming for weight loss, endurance, or interval training, our elliptical machine has got you covered

【Easy-To-Read LCD Monitor】The 5.5IN clear, bright display ensures you stay focused and engaged throughout your workout. Track your progress in real-time, including SCAN, TIME, DISTANCE, CALORIES, SPEED, PULSE/RPM, and more. Besides, it can not only display TEMP, CLOCK, and set ALARM CLOCK, but also measure your B.M.R(Basal Metabolic Rate), BODYFAT, and B.M.I(Body Mass Index) by setting your gender, height, weight, and age

【Dual Handlebars Design】The dual handlebar design of the elliptical training machines has the function of improving exercise efficiency. Through different gripping methods, you can activate more muscle groups to participate in the exercise, such as strengthening the upper limbs, back, and core muscle groups. This will not only make your body more symmetrical but also achieve better exercise results in a short time

【Humanized Design】The large non-slip texture on the pedal surface ensures that you can stand firmly on the pedal, making your exercise more worry-free. The transport wheels attached to the front foot tube allow you to move easily and store it in a corner; You can place your drinks on the bottle holder, allowing you to replenish water in time during exercise
【Excellent Quality Service】We provide a high-quality elliptical machine and satisfied customer service. If there is a quality or assembly problem, please don't hesitate to contact us with your needs

description: Product DescriptionThe Precor E FT 546i commercial series elliptical fitness cross-trainer is a solid machine that is built to mirror the natural movements of the body. The natural and smooth movement of this machine will give an outstanding workout without harshly impacting the joints. It is designed to move fluidly, and is very easy to operate and offers an intensive cardiovascular workout, as well as an intensive workout for the gluts and quadriceps. The Precor EFT 546i elliptical has an adjustable cross ramp that allows users to select an angle between fifteen and forty degrees. This allows for isolation of the hamstrings, calves, quads and gluts. The stride lengths of this machine vary, ranging from 21.2-Inch to 24.7-Inch. This makes the workout comparable on what you would receive on a stair climber. The machine has ten programs that are preset, including a program that is designed to test the users’ fitness level. The Precor EFT 546i also has the ability to change to a new workout program at any point during the workout. The display console is a very attractive design and is easy to use. It has very large buttons, and immediately responds to users’ request. It also contains a six-phase generator, which allows for reduced friction when necessary. This helps to make the workout comfortable during each workout. Other features of the EFT 546i include the accessory holder, which is equipped to hold water bottles, reading materials and more, a numeric keypad, heart rate monitoring and the option of installing a personal viewing screen. The 546i also contains a biofeedback center, a computerized system designed to provide feedback on heart rate and calories. This feedback system will show your actual heart rate and compare it to the target heart rate zone required for effective cardiovascular training and weight loss.Amazon.comWith a smooth, fluid motion that mirrors the movement of the body, the Precor EFX546i elliptical fitness crosstrainer provides an outstanding workout experience with a natural, elliptical movement. Designed for ease-of-use with intuitive displays that help you get on and get going, the 546i features an adjustable CrossRamp that allows you to change incline and target specific muscle groups.  Easy-to-use handgrip sensors monitor heart rate. Stride lengths vary along the incline of the CrossRamp from 21.2 to 24.7 inches. title: Teeter FreeStep Recumbent Cross Trainer Stepper, Zero-Impact Exercise Bike Alternative w/Patented Physical Therapy Stride, Up to 350lb, Free App w/Trainer Workouts
breadCrumbs: Sports & Outdoors › Exercise & Fitness › Cardio Training › Step Machines
description: Set yourself free with the Teeter FreeStep for the ultimate full-body workout, free from joint pain. The FreeStep is the only home-use stepper with patented physical therapy technology, for a natural stepping motion that eases join strain. 93% of users surveyed reported the FreeStep is easier on their knees and back than other cardio options. Dual power motion engages both the upper and lower body, distributing muscle exertion to avoid burn out and make exercise feel easier. Proven to burn 17.4% more calories than a recumbent bike, the FreeStep delivers a superior cardio workout while incorporating full-body resistance training to develop muscle strength throughout the whole body. The LT1 delivers a premium, low-impact exercise experience with 13 levels of magnetic resistance, easy-reach water bottle holder, and convenient transport wheels, all within a low-profile footprint and a 300 lb user rating. The LT3 offers a step up with UltraGlide Bearings with long-lasting frictionless motion, SoftStep Pedals with durable grip surface, larger ComfortSelect Seat, and durable SureGrip Handles. The LT7 upgrades your workout experience with 20-level quick-key magnetic resistance, a 9" color LCD screen with 21 pre-programmed, goal-based workouts, HRM compatibility, and extra-large seat with more positioning options. Convenient features include an electronic Step Lock for easier entry and exit, dual cup holders and transport wheels - topped off with an increased 350 lb user rating. Inspire motivation with the FREE Teeter Move app. Access a huge variety of trainer-led workouts designed for all fitness levels, on demand, no subscription needed!
features: ZERO-IMPACT EXERCISE: Ideal for all fitness levels. The natural stepping motion and comfortable seated position eliminates stress on the joints and back while delivering a total body, fat-burning cardio workout. A great exercise option for those with Arthritis, Parkinson's or MS

PHYSICAL THERAPY TECHNOLOGY: The only home-use stepper with a patented natural stride licensed from commercial physiotherapy steppers. Experience the same gentle, effective exercise found in a PT office in your own home.

EASIER ON KNEES & BACK: Compared to typical recumbent bikes or cross trainers with a cycle motion, FreeStep aligns the joints for better muscle engagement with less stress to the hips, knees and ankles.

TOTAL BODY WORKOUT: Dual power motion works your upper and lower body, distributing muscle exertion. Your workout will feel easier while engaging all major muscle groups to build strength and burn more calories. Isolate your legs or arms to vary your workout.

LT3 PREMIUM FEATURES: UltraGlide Bearings promise long-lasting frictionless motion for fluid start up and stride transitions; SoftStep Pedals with durable grip surface for added traction and control; Larger ComfortSelect Seat with more positioning options; SureGrip handles with high-grade polyurethane coating for unmatched durability.

FREE PERSONAL TRAINING APP: Get results you can see and feel with Teeter Move! Our trainers make working out fun with a vast library of classes that vary in length, experience level and session type. Subscription free. iOS /Android compatible.

WHISPER-QUIET MAGNETIC RESISTANCE: 13 Levels with easy-grip adjustment lets you go from light to intense without skipping a beat. Friction-free, long-lasting performance; perfectly synchronized handles and pedals deliver a silent, fluid ride so you can workout anytime…day or night!

HANDLE & SEAT ADJUSTABILITY: Quick transition between 4 grip positions to add workout variety and target the back, chest, biceps and triceps. 3-position recline and variable seat height ensures the perfect posture for multi-user households.

DIGITAL CONSOLE, MEDIA RACK & CONVENIENCE FEATURES: Track progress with the easy-to-read digital console (time, distance, speed and calorie burn); battery-operated so you can use anywhere; integrated device and water bottle holders; convenient transport wheels; low-profile footprint (54" x 38").

WE’VE GOT YOUR BACK: 40+ Years as premiere brand for inversion and joint-friendly fitness equipment; Frustration-Free Assembly w/ BILT App; US-based support; Rated for users 4 ft 11 in- 6 ft 6 in; 300 lb.

aPlusContent.title: Product Description
aPlusContent.rawText:
Product Description
The video showcases the product in use.The video guides you through product setup.The video compares multiple products.The video shows the product being unpacked.
ㅤ 
Physical Therapy Technology 
FreeStep is the ONLY home-use stepper with a patented stride motion licensed from commercial physiotherapy steppers.
The unique natural stride allows you to enjoy the same gentle, effective exercise found in a PT office in your own home… at a fraction of the cost.
Compared to Recumbent Bike 
The cycle motion of a typical recumbent bike or cross trainer creates awkward hip and knee posture, causing joint strain.
FreeStep Physical Therapy Technology aligns the joints in a natural stepping stride for better muscle engagement with less stress to the hips, knees and ankles.
Feel-Better, Feel-Easier Exercise 
93% of users surveyed* reported the FreeStep is “easier on the knees and back”.
Dual Power Motion distributes muscle exertion, so you’ll get a full body workout without muscle burnout.
*Colorado Center for Health & Sport Science: Recumbent Stepper VS Recumbent Bike energy expenditure. 
Burns More Calories, Builds More Muscle 
Engaging upper and lower body burns 17.4% more calories at the same level of effort on a recumbent bike. *Based on Study by Colorado Center for Health & Sport Science.
Plus, FreeStep builds more lean muscle so you can continue fat burning long after your workout!
Previous page
Resistance for Rehab, Cardio & Strength 
Adjust upper and lower body resistance from tame to intense without skipping a beat. Simply turn the large, ergonomic dial to accommodate all workout needs. 
Smooth Performance 
Smooth Performance 
Friction-free resistance and perfectly synchronized handles and pedals deliver a silent, fluid ride so you can workout anytime…day or night! Quality tested to 2.3 million cycles. 
Target Back, Chest, Biceps & Triceps 
Adjustable handles offer quick transition between four grips to add workout variety and target different muscle groups. Go arms only, legs only or total body! 
Large, Contoured Seat 
3-position recline, 2-position depth (LT3 only) and variable seat height ensures the perfect posture for multi-user households. Easily adjusts from 4’11”-6’6”, rated to 300 lb. 
Motivation Within View 
Listen to music or read from your device while monitoring your time, distance, speed and calorie-burn with the large-print screen. 
Easy Access Design 
A water bottle shelf holds your hydration within reach during your workout and transport wheels make for easy movement and storage. 
Next page
Teeter Move App 
Motivation to Achieve Your Goals 

FREE trainer-led fitness classes for every level with Teeter Move! Choose from an expansive library of on-demand classes with any iOS or Android device. 
Our certified trainers make working out fun with classes that vary in length, fitness level, and workout type – including the exclusive Find Your Fit Series. Simplify your fitness routine with these curated programs (3-7x / week) tailored to your specific fitness goal. Simply press play and discover how good exercise can feel.

features: 【FULL MOTION WORKOUT】This rower activates multiple muscle groups, including your legs, back, core, and arms, for a comprehensive exercise thanks to 360-degree full motion arms that mimic natural rowing form for a complete range of movement.

【350 LB WEIGHT CAPACITY & COMPACT】This rowing machine robustly accommodates all sizes yet its space-saving compact. The Digital Monitor tracks stroke rate, time, count, calories, and total strokes to simplify monitoring your rowing workout.
【REAL ROWING SIMULATION】Feel like you're rowing on water with the SunnyFit App, this machine's realistic rowing simulation for a more engaging and effective home workout.

【SMOOTH RESISTANCE】12 levels of smooth hydraulic resistance for your workout intensity and challenge yourself at any fitness level. Seamlessly increase or decrease the resistance with the turn of a knob to target different muscle groups.

【COMFORT & STABILITY】Featuring an ergonomic padded seat with elevated, wider design for easy mounting, superior comfort, and no slipping during prolonged workouts. Paired with non-slip grip handlebars for added stability.

【EASY ASSEMBLY & SAFETY FEATURES】Assemble this rowing machine easily and start working out. Large anti-slip foot pedals keep your feet secure while rowing. Adjustable straps further ensure confidence during your workout.

【ERGONOMIC SEAT】Padded seat cushion and adjustable straps provide a comfortable and customized fit. Pivoting foot pedals with adjustable fastener straps accommodate most foot size securely during the full range of motion.

【Sunny Health & Fitness Commitment】A top fitness brand for 20+ years, offers superior products and a dedication to excellence. Count on our committed customer service and trainers for the best fitness experience.

title: Sunny Health & Fitness 2-in-1 Smart Upright Elliptical Full-Body Exerciser w/Pulse Sensors, Home Cross-Training Cardio Workout Machine, Free SunnyFit App Bluetooth Connnect, Optional Long Stride
breadCrumbs: Sports & Outdoors › Exercise & Fitness › Cardio Training › Elliptical Trainers
features: 【LOW-IMPACT ELLIPTICAL, 300LB CAPACITY ENDURANCE】The elliptical exerciser is built for durability and performance, supporting users up to 300lbs. It features magnetic resistance, built-in pulse sensors, and a 12" stride. Its smart design ensures a smooth, low-impact workout with comfort and reliability.

【FREE FITNESS APP CONNECTION】Enjoy FREE access to the SunnyFit APP with NO membership fees! Dive into 1,000+ trainer-led workouts, explore 10,000+ virtual scenic tours, track your progress, challenge others, and much more!

【QUIET AND SMOOTH】Enjoy a low-noise workout with our elliptical’s belt drive system and 16 levels of magnetic resistance. Ideal for solo sessions and family fitness, ensuring a quiet and smooth exercise experience.

【BUILT-IN PULSE SENSORS】Utilizing the Pulse & Heart Rate Sensors for real-time feedback. This feature helps with precise workout adjustments to stay in target zones & alerts you if your heart rate exceeds safe limits.

【DIGITAL MONITOR w/ TARGETING FUNCTION】Personalize your training by setting time, distance, calorie, and heart rate goals. Track progress in real-time with the advanced digital monitor and use the built-in pulse sensor for precise workout metrics.

【FULL-BODY WORKOUT, BI-DIRECTIONAL MOTION】Enhance your fitness routine with bi-directional motion and a standard 12" stride. Textured hand grips and arm exercisers ensure a secure hold and dynamic movement, delivering a complete upper and lower body workout for all fitness levels.

【MICRO-ADJUSTABLE FLOOR STABILIZERS】Easily adapt to uneven surfaces with adjustable floor stabilizers—just twist to micro-adjust the height. This feature enhances safety and stability during workouts, ensuring a secure and balanced exercise experience on any flooring type.

【ALL-IN-ONE CONVENIENCE FEATURES】Stay entertained with the built-in device holder and keep hydrated using the convenient bottle holder. Effortlessly move your elliptical with transportation wheels, combining practicality and ease for a seamless workout experience in any space.

【EFFORTLESS 8-STEP ASSEMBLY】Pre-assembled main frame allows for a quick setup in just 8 steps. Most users can complete it solo with ease. Includes a user manual, adjustment guide, and video tutorial for guidance. Sunny customer service is always available to assist, so you can focus on your fitness goals right away!

【20+ YEARS OF EXCELLENCE】Sunny Health & Fitness, a U.S.-based company, offers top-quality equipment with a commitment to excellence. Our dedicated U.S. customer service team and certified trainers ensure a truly unmatched FIT FOR EVERYONE experience.

aPlusContent.title: Product Description
aPlusContent.rawText:
Product Description
Sunny Health & Fitness Smart Elliptical Machine w/300LB Capacity & Pulse Sensor 
The 300LB Capacity Endurance Smart Elliptical delivers a durable, low-impact workout with magnetic resistance, a 12" stride, and built-in pulse sensors. Access the FREE SunnyFit fitness app for 1,000+ trainer-led workouts video and real-time metrics. Enjoy a smooth, quiet belt drive with 16 resistance levels, bi-directional motion, and full-body features. Floor stabilizers, a device holder, bottle holder, and transport wheels add convenience, while easy 8-step assembly ensures quick setup. 
Hand Grip Sensors 
Utilize pulse and heart rate sensors for real-time feedback, enabling precise workout adjustments and alerts if your heart rate exceeds safe limits. 
16-Level Magnetic Resistance 
16-level magnetic resistance provides adjustable intensity, while the belt-drive ensures silent operation, perfect for quiet workouts at home. 
Monitor w/Targeting Function 
Set goals for time, distance, calories, and heart rate with the advanced monitor, tracking progress in real-time. Pulse sensor for accurate metrics. 
Bi-Direction, Full-Body Motion 
Enhance your routine with a 12" stride, bi-directional motion, and arm exercisers for a complete upper and lower body workout. 
Micro-Adjustable Stabilizer 
Adapt to uneven surfaces with adjustable stabilizers that micro-adjust height, ensuring safety and stability for secure workouts on any floor. 
Anti-Slip Pedals 
The anti-slip pedals maximize user experience and safety to the fullest extent. 
Bottle Holder 
Keep hydrated during workouts with the convenient bottle holder, ensuring your drink is always within easy reach. 
Device Holder 
Stay entertained during workouts with the built-in device holder, keeping your phone or tablet secure for streaming, training, or browsing. 
Previous page
Next page
1 Join the SunnyFit App 2 Tour the World 3 1000+ Training Videos 4 Connect & Track 5 The SunnyFit Community 
What is stride length on elliptical? 
On an elliptical, it refers to the range of motion the machine offers, with standard strides (12" at least) simulating natural walking or running for a more effective workout. 
How is stride length measured on an elliptical? 
Stride length on an elliptical is measured by the distance your feet travel in a full cycle (toe-to-toe at the farthest point). A longer stride offers a greater range of motion, engaging more muscles. 
How does the elliptical offer a truly quiet and smooth workout? 
The belt-drive mechanism and 16-level magnetic resistance provide silent, adjustable intensity, ensuring peaceful, quiet workouts. 
How can I personalize my training experience? 
Set your goals and start training with real-time tracking and precise metrics using the advanced digital monitor and built-in pulse sensor. 
How easy is it to set up the elliptical? 
The elliptical can be set up in just 8 steps, with a pre-assembled main frame. Most users can complete it solo, and a video guide and support team are available if needed.

title: Peloton Tread | Treadmill for Running, Walking, and Hiking with Manual or Auto-Incline Options and Immersive 24” HD Touchscreen
breadCrumbs: Sports & Outdoors › Exercise & Fitness › Cardio Training › Treadmills
description: Peloton Tread, Treadmill for Running, Walking and Hiking with Immersive 24” HD Touchscreen The Peloton Tread brings a studio experience home. Get a powerful cardio workout with a 24" HD touchscreen with front and rear-facing speakers. Unlock thousands of classes, both on and off the Tread, like running, walking, hiking, or Tread Bootcamp. When rest days come around, you can balance running and strength with yoga, meditation and stretching. Explore our lineup of 50+ instructors, and track your progress class after class using on-screen metrics. Your Peloton Tread is compatible with any ANT+ heart rate monitor, Apple Watch®, Strava, or any Android watch running Wear OS 3 or higher. Set up one-tap fitness tracking to monitor your heart rate and close your rings. All-Access Membership must be purchased separately in order to access Peloton classes on your Tread. You’ll pay one monthly fee for your entire household (Age, height and weight restrictions apply.) so everyone can access our entire library of classes that range from 5 to 90 minutes. With workouts that fit your experience level, mood, goals, music style, and schedule, you’ll be ready to train on and off your Peloton Tread or move anytime, anywhere with the Peloton App.
features: VALUE-PACKED MEMBERSHIP: A Peloton All-Access Membership must be purchased separately in order to access Peloton content on your Tread. You’ll pay $44/mo for your entire household and get unlimited access to our entire library of content available on your Tread and the Peloton App. Age, height, and weight restrictions apply. Your account can be activated on the touch screen during Tread assembly.

THOUSANDS OF LIVE & ON-DEMAND CLASSES: Access to thousands of classes, both on and off your Tread, like running, walking, hiking, strength, bootcamp, yoga, and more. To customize your workouts, Peloton allows you to stack classes, enabling you to transition from class to class with ease

IMMERSIVE, INTUITIVE RUNNING AND WALKING EXPERIENCE: Speed and incline knobs allow you to easily adjust controls without breaking your stride, or use auto-incline to automatically follow instructor cues up or downhill Use captions or receive spoken feedback from the Peloton Tread touchscreen with TalkBack Knobs with jump buttons.

On-screen shortcuts allow you to change speeds from 0 to 12.5 MPH and incline grades from 0% to 12.5% Clip-on the safety key while running and the belt will come to a quick stop if detached. Lock your Tread with a passcode when not in use

TRACK YOUR PROGRESS & METRICS: A wide-range of on-screen, real-time metrics enable you track progress, streaks and performance across workouts Follow training programs, or set personal targets during a freestyle workout, to help you meet your running and strength goals

CONNECT TO YOUR TRAINING DEVICES: Easily connect any ANT+ heart rate monitor, Apple Watch and Strava to your Peloton Tread to capture performance data, including Strive Score, an in-class metric on heart rate zones, from your workouts and track fitness goals

SPACE TO RUN ON A COMPACT FOOTPRINT: The Peloton Tread has a compact 5½' x 2¾' footprint that still has plenty of room for running and walking on its 59” textured, comfortable and quiet running belt Get a powerful cardio workout in less space than your average treadmill We recommend at least 24” of space to the left, right and front of the Tread, and 79” of space in the back for storing and training The ceiling height minimum is 20” greater than the user’s height

aPlusContent.title: From the manufacturer
aPlusContent.rawText:
From the manufacturer
Commercial 14.9 
Elite Trainers & Interactive Workouts at Home 
Low-Impact Workouts Led by Elite Trainers 
Expertly crafted, the Commercial 14.9 front-drive elliptical trainer includes a 30-day iFIT family membership* that complements your workout and provides professional fitness training in your home. Use your elliptical’s immersive 10” HD touchscreen to browse a vast library of Studio Classes and Global Workouts, each led by a knowledgeable iFIT Trainer who automatically adjusts your resistance and incline to optimize your exercise. 
*iFIT experience shown. WIFI and internet required. Credit/debit card required for activation. After the included 30-day membership, iFIT auto-renews at then-current rate, plus tax, unless canceled in advance. 
Product Features 
Power Adjustable Incline 
Take your elliptical up to a 20-degree incline with the push of a button, or let your iFIT Trainer automatically adjust your elliptical to mimic real-world terrain. 
10” Smart HD Touchscreen 
Stream high-energy Studio Classes and breathtaking Global Workouts directly to your elliptical’s 10” HD touchscreen, following iFIT Trainers as they auto-adjust your resistance and incline. 
Oversized Adjustable Pedals 
Perfect for households with multiple users, the Commercial 14.9 elliptical features oversized cushioned pedals that can be adjusted to fit user preferences. 
Automatic Trainer Control 
Your iFIT Trainer will auto-adjust your elliptical between 26 digital resistance levels for a fully optimized workout in the comfort of your home. 
30-Day iFIT Family Membership Included* 
This included membership allows you to create up to 5 individual workout profiles that track exercise history, personal metrics, and fitness scores across all iFIT-compatible equipment. 
iFIT Trainers Move You 
Full-Body Training 
Hop off the elliptical and follow your trainers to participate in high-powered cross-training workouts designed to get you moving and feeling good. 
Get Out and Explore 
Follow your favorite iFIT Trainers through breathtaking workouts filmed on location around the world, all while receiving professional instruction on your form. 
Studio Classes Come Home 
Stream high-energy LIVE and on-demand Studio Classes led by elite iFIT Trainers in a motivating and empowering atmosphere any time you want. 
Automatic Trainer Control 
In Live Workouts, Studio Classes, and Global Workouts, your iFIT Trainer will automatically adjust your resistance and incline to optimize your exercise.

title: Sunny Health & Fitness Compact Adjustable Rowing Machine with 12 Levels of Resistance for Complete Body Workouts and Optional Free SunnyFit App Enhanced Connectivity
inStockText: In Stock  Only 1 left in stock - order soon.
breadCrumbs: Sports & Outdoors › Exercise & Fitness › Cardio Training › Rowers
features: 【FULL BODY WORKOUT】Complete body workout that engages all major muscle groups with the smooth, hydraulic resistance that targets legs, glutes, back, arms, shoulders, and core. The low-impact rowing motion works your whole body.

【FREE CONNECTED APP】 Enjoy FREE access to the SunnyFit App with every Sunny Health & Fitness product—no membership fees! Dive into 1,000+ trainer-led workouts, explore 10,000+ virtual scenic tours, track progress, challenge others, and much more!

【COMPACT & LIGHTWEIGHT】The portable design maximizes storage for convenience. The rower takes up minimal space for hassle-free storage when not in use. Weighing only 22.4 LB, it is light enough to carry from room to room or transport in a car.

【SMOOTH RESISTANCE】12 levels of smooth hydraulic resistance for your workout intensity and challenge yourself at any fitness level. Seamlessly increase or decrease the resistance with the turn of a knob to target different muscle groups.
【INTEGRATED DEVICE HOLDER】A convenient spot to securely hold your phone, allowing you to stay motivated and entertained during your workout while monitoring your progress on the digital display.

【QUICK & EASY ASSEMBLY】Made to be user-friendly in operation and assembling. No complicated installation or setup required, simply attach the stabilizer bars, seat, foot pedals, and monitor mount with the included instructions. Assembling time: less than 5 minutes.

【ENGINEERED TO LAST】 With an effective minimalistic and modern design, our Smart Rower is made of Alloy Steel, resulting in a strong, hard, and tough machine. The perfect alternative to classic rowing machines, and without compromising your cardio workout efficiency.

【QUIET OPERATION】Optimized design for minimal noise. Developed to be mindful of those around you, our rower’s handlebar and seat movements are almost silent, perfect to utilize while virtually rowing around the world from your smart phone or watching television.

【ERGONOMIC SEAT】Padded seat cushion and adjustable straps provide a comfortable and customized fit. Pivoting foot pedals with adjustable fastener straps accommodate most foot size securely during the full range of motion.

【PREMIER U.S.-BASED BRAND】With 20+ years of excellence, Sunny Health & Fitness delivers top-notch equipment dedicated to excellence. With our devoted support team and certified trainers enjoy an unmatched FIT FOR EVERYONE experience.

title: YOSUDA Under Desk Elliptical Electric,Ellipse Leg Exerciser for Seniors,Fully Assembled Seated Pedal Exerciser with Remote Control with Free Footstraps & 10 Adjustable Speeds
inStockText: In Stock  Only 1 left in stock - order soon.
breadCrumbs: Sports & Outdoors › Exercise & Fitness › Cardio Training › Elliptical Trainers
description: YOSUDA ellipse leg exerciser is a versatile and user-friendly exercise machine that people of various fitness levels and age groups can use. Its compact design and quiet operation make it suitable for home or office use, and it offers a range of health benefits for those looking to maintain an active lifestyle. Note: Only use it when you sit. This device is not suitable for therapeutic purposes. Please do not use it with other electronic medical devices like pacemakers. Do not use this product if there are steel plates or other fixtures in the body after surgery.
features: Low-Impact Exercise: YOSUDA under desk elliptical's low-impact, zero-pressure design helps stimulate blood circulation, strengthen lower body muscles, and enhance mobility; ideal for office workers, seniors, and those needing leg rehabilitation

Remote Control: Adjust settings effortlessly without bending over; ellipse leg exerciser features 3 pre-set 30-minute workout modes (P1-P3), manual mode with 10-speed levels, and forward/reverse motion for a versatile workout experience while sitting

Reliable Quality for Quiet and Smooth Workouts: Equipped with YOSUDA’s patented motor for reliable performance and a smooth exercise session; rubberized bottom prevents movement, allowing you to work, watch TV, or read without distractions

Seamless Office Fitness: Designed to fit neatly under desks, helping you burn calories and reduce stiffness from prolonged sitting; operates quietly to ensure you can stay focused without disturbing noise

Elderly-Friendly, Portable: No assembly required; lightweight with a built-in handle for easy transport and compact for convenient storage; With the free foot straps, your foot won't slip; ideal for seniors and those with limited mobility, making it a thoughtful gift for family and friends

Easy Operation, Real-Time Tracking: Start with a single button press; easily switch modes using the LCD screen or remote control; LCD screen displays real-time data on time, distance, speed, calories burned, and step count

Innovate Anti-Slip Pedals with Raised Dots：The anti-slip, shock-absorbing pedal design with raised dots promotes blood circulation in the soles of your feet and enhances joint flexibility. The compact and portable elliptical machine uses a bi-directional circular motion to effectively reduce impact on the knees. Warm Tips: Wear socks or use barefoot for a better experience
Note: Please do not use it with other electronic medical devices like pacemakers. Do not use this product if there are steel plates or other fixtures in the body after surgery
Exceptional Customer Support: Over 20 years of experience in home exercise equipment; trusted by over 1 million families; offering 24/7 customer support

title: Sunny Health & Fitness Smart Foldable Cardio Stair Stepper Vertical Climber Exercise Machine for Home Workout with Long Extended Step Range 330 lbs Max Weight, Optional Connection w/Free SunnyFit App
inStockText: In Stock  Only 4 left in stock - order soon.
breadCrumbs: Sports & Outdoors › Exercise & Fitness › Cardio Training › Step Machines
features: 【EXTENDED STEP RANGE】The climbing stepper offers an extensive step range that replicates climbing movements, delivering an all-encompassing workout that targets diverse muscle groups, including the upper body, core, glutes, hamstrings, and calves.

【MOUNTAIN CLIMBING SIMULATION】Emulate the challenges of outdoor mountaineering with a climber that offers adjustable step heights. Tailor the intensity of your ascent with steps ranging from a minimum height of 3.6 inches to a peak of 16.9 inches.

【FREE CONNECTED APP】 Enjoy FREE access to the SunnyFit App with every Sunny Health & Fitness product—no membership fees! Dive into 1,000+ trainer-led workouts, explore 10,000+ virtual scenic tours, track your progress, challenge others, and much more!

【ERGONOMIC HANDLEBARS WITH PULSE SENSORS】The climber comes with sturdy and comfortable handlebars with built-in pulse sensors. This design ensures a safe and stable grip during your workout but also enables continuous monitoring of your heart rate.

【SMOOTH & QUIET】This climber stepper has a dual hydraulic system that ensures a smooth and near-silent workout experience. Featuring hydraulic piston cylinders, it allows for adjustments in height intensity, catering to your specific fitness needs.

【ADVANCED FITNESS TRACKING】 Stay motivated with the user-friendly LCD monitor that tracks your fitness journey. Monitor key metrics such as time, strokes per minute, count, calories burned, total accumulated workout time, and pulse rate.

【COMPACT & FOLDABLE DESIGN】The climber strider features minimalist design that's perfect for space conservation. Its slender profile and lightweight construction are complemented by a foldable feature for effortless storage and space optimization.
【EASY ASSEMBLY】Our stepper is designed with user-friendly assembly in mind, ensuring a quick and easy setup process for your convenience.

【SAFE AND MOBILE DESIGN】 The max climber is fitted with non-slip, secure pedals and stabilizers for a safe exercise experience, alongside built-in transportation wheels for effortless mobility and easy repositioning within your space.

【Sunny Health & Fitness Commitment】 A top fitness brand for 20+ years, offers superior products and a dedication to excellence. Count on our committed customer service and enjoy peace of mind with a 1-year warranty on the structural frame.

title: Under Desk Elliptical Machine, Electric Seated Pedal Exerciser, Mini Ellipse Leg Exerciser with Remoter, 12 Level Speeds, Forward & Reverse Direction, Manual & Auto Mode for Home Office
breadCrumbs: Sports & Outdoors › Exercise & Fitness › Cardio Training › Elliptical Trainers
description: 1. Boost your productivity while staying active! Meet our essential mini elliptical for seamless workouts or rehabilitation, all from your home or office chair 2. Whether working, reading, or watching TV, turn sitting time into an exercise opportunity with this innovative pedal exerciser. Burn calories, shed weight, and feel fantastic with home-use elliptical machines 3. Please noted that it is best not to use this elliptical machine with a pacemaker
features: Under Desk Elliptical: Boost your productivity while staying active! Meet our essential mini elliptical for seamless workouts or rehabilitation, all from your home or office chair. Whether working, reading, or watching TV, turn sitting time into an exercise opportunity with this innovative pedal exerciser. Burn calories, shed weight, and feel fantastic with home-use elliptical machines

HR & Auto Mode: Exercise anytime, anywhere. In HR(Manual) mode, you can adjust workout time(15-30min), speed(1-12) and direction (forward&reverse) by remote control or button of the elliptical machine. Then switch "mode" to Auto mode that the speed and direction have been programmed. In auto mode, you can adjust P1-P12 mode by press mode button, the speed of the mini seated elliptical changes every minute, and the direction changes every 3 minutes

12 Speeds & 12 Modes: CURSOR Fitness elliptical training machine features 12 level speeds and 12 workout modes, providing diverse possibilities to elevate your exercise routine. Whether you are doing rehabilitation exercises or strengthen leg muscles and relax foot joints, choose the different speed and mode you want. You can use under desk elliptical while watching TV, reading newspapers or working

Forward & Reverse: The forward and backward direction for a comprehensive leg exercise. The LCD monitor tracks time, diatance, counts and calories burned in real-time. The pedal exerciser for the elderly comes with a remote control to control the machine, allowing you to adjust it without bending over, protecting your waist and back. It is perfect for the elderly and people with limited mobility. Please do not use standing up

Mute Setting: CURSOR elliptical equipped with the latest mute system, which ensures a ultra quiet workout without disturbing your colleague or baby sleeping even at a high speed. When plugged in, long press the Power button to turn off the screen, and long press the Direction button on the machine for 1.5 seconds. After two beeps, cancel the sound prompt, and follow the same steps to restore normal sound

Ideal Gift Companion: Health is invaluable, whether you are an office worker, an elderly person, or in need of rehabilitation training, this under seated pedal exerciser is perfect leg exercise equipment to relax leg muscle and promote leg blood circulation. An ideal gift for friends, parents or grandparents, encouraging regular use to ensure foot joint and muscle group relaxation

title: Teeter FreeStep Recumbent Cross Trainer Stepper, Zero-Impact Exercise Bike Alternative w/Patented Physical Therapy Stride, Up to 350lb, Free App w/Trainer Workouts
breadCrumbs: Sports & Outdoors › Exercise & Fitness › Cardio Training › Step Machines
description: Set yourself free with the Teeter FreeStep for the ultimate full-body workout, free from joint pain. The FreeStep is the only home-use stepper with patented physical therapy technology, for a natural stepping motion that eases join strain. 93% of users surveyed reported the FreeStep is easier on their knees and back than other cardio options. Dual power motion engages both the upper and lower body, distributing muscle exertion to avoid burn out and make exercise feel easier. Proven to burn 17.4% more calories than a recumbent bike, the FreeStep delivers a superior cardio workout while incorporating full-body resistance training to develop muscle strength throughout the whole body. The LT1 delivers a premium, low-impact exercise experience with 13 levels of magnetic resistance, easy-reach water bottle holder, and convenient transport wheels, all within a low-profile footprint and a 300 lb user rating. The LT3 offers a step up with UltraGlide Bearings with long-lasting frictionless motion, SoftStep Pedals with durable grip surface, larger ComfortSelect Seat, and durable SureGrip Handles. The LT7 upgrades your workout experience with 20-level quick-key magnetic resistance, a 9" color LCD screen with 21 pre-programmed, goal-based workouts, HRM compatibility, and extra-large seat with more positioning options. Convenient features include an electronic Step Lock for easier entry and exit, dual cup holders and transport wheels - topped off with an increased 350 lb user rating. Inspire motivation with the FREE Teeter Move app. Access a huge variety of trainer-led workouts designed for all fitness levels, on demand, no subscription needed!
features: ZERO-IMPACT EXERCISE: Ideal for all fitness levels. The natural stepping motion and comfortable seated position eliminates stress on the joints and back while delivering a total body, fat-burning cardio workout. A great exercise option for those with Arthritis, Parkinson's or MS.

PHYSICAL THERAPY TECHNOLOGY: The only home-use stepper with a patented natural stride licensed from commercial physiotherapy steppers. Experience the same gentle, effective exercise found in a PT office in your own home.

"EASIER ON KNEES & BACK": Compared to typical recumbent bikes or cross trainers with a cycle motion, FreeStep aligns the joints for better muscle engagement with less stress to the hips, knees and ankles.

TOTAL BODY WORKOUT: Dual power motion works your upper and lower body, distributing muscle exertion. Your workout will feel easier while engaging all major muscle groups to build strength and burn more calories. Isolate your legs or arms to vary your workout.

9” COLOR LCD SCREEN & MEDIA RACK: Inspire motivation with 7 tracking metrics and 21 pre-programmed, goal-based workouts; Bluetooth heart rate compatible (HRM sold sep); Media Rack with USB charging port and adjustable height for phone or tablet makes it easy to follow along with classes, listen to music or read during your workout.

20-LEVEL MAGNETIC RESISTANCE: Control with console quick-keys ranging from 0-105 lb resistance; Friction-free, long-lasting performance; whisper-quiet synchronized handles and pedals so you can workout anytime…day or night!

PERFORMANCE FEATURES: UltraGlide Bearings promise long-lasting frictionless motion for fluid start up and stride transitions; SoftStep Pedals with durable grip surface for added traction and control; Extra-Large ComfortMax Seat with more positioning options; SureGrip handles with high-grade polyurethane coating for unmatched durability.
CONVENIENCE FEATURES: Electronic Step Lock for easy entry and exit; Dual cup holders keep your water and pocket contents within easy reach; transport wheels.

FREE PERSONAL TRAINING APP: Get results you can see and feel with Teeter Move! Our trainers make working out fun with a vast library of classes that vary in length, experience level and session type. Subscription free. iOS /Android compatible.

WE’VE GOT YOUR BACK: 40+ Years as premiere brand for inversion and joint-friendly fitness equipment; Frustration-Free Assembly w/ BILT App; US-based support; Rated for users 4 ft 11 in- 6 ft 6 in; 350 lb.

aPlusContent.title: Product Description
aPlusContent.rawText:
Product Description
The video showcases the product in use.The video guides you through product setup.The video compares multiple products.The video shows the product being unpacked.
ㅤ 
Physical Therapy Technology 
The ONLY home-use stepper with a patented natural stride licensed from commercial physio steppers, offering the same gentle exercise found in a PT office.
93% users surveyed* said FreeStep is “easier on the knees and back” than other cardio options.
*CO Center for Health & Sport Science survey 
ㅤ 
Compared to Recumbent Bike 
The cycle motion of a typical recumbent bike or cross trainer creates awkward hip and knee posture, causing joint strain.
FreeStep Physical Therapy Technology aligns the joints in a natural stepping stride for better muscle engagement with less stress to the hips, knees and ankles.
ㅤ 
Previous page
Burns More, Builds More 
Upper and lower body engagement burns 17.4% more calories than a recumbent bike. Plus, build more lean muscle so you can continue fat burning long after your workout! 
Resistance for Rehab, Cardio & Strength 
At the touch of a button, take upper and lower body resistance from tame to intense without skipping a beat. 0-105lb resistance range to meet all workout needs. 
Smooth Performance 
Friction-free resistance and perfectly synchronized handles and pedals deliver a silent, fluid ride so you can workout anytime…day or night! Quality tested to 2.3 million cycles. 
Target Back, Chest, Bicep, Triceps 
Easy-Lock Micro-Adjust handles offer quick transition between four grips to add workout variety and muscle group targeting. Go arms only, legs only or total body! 
Premium LT7 Seat 
ComfortMax Seat provides 35% larger surface area with 3-position depth and recline settings, and piston-assist height for multi-user adjustability. From 4'11” – 6'6”, rated to 350lb. 
Easy Access Design 
Dual Drink Holder keeps your hydration within reach during your workout and transport wheels make for easy movement and storage. 
Next page
ㅤ 
Previous page
Every Step Counts 
9” LCD backlit display tracks time, distance, speed, calories, resistance, burn rate + Bluetooth heart rate compatibility (HRM sold sep). 
Motivation in Real Time 
21 pre-programmed workouts like Cardio, Cruising, Uphill Climb, Fat Burn, Interval, and our goal-oriented series (time, distance, calories, resistance). 
Hands-Free Entertainment 
The adjustable-height media rack holds your device for clear view of Teeter Move Classes or your favorite shows. Keep your device charged with the integrated USB port. 
Every Control in One Place 
Console Quick-Keys provide user-friendly control for your FreeStep including multi-user setting selector, Step-Lock for enter/exit stability, resistance controls, and more. 
Next page
ㅤ 
Teeter Move App 
Motivation to Achieve Your Goals 

FREE trainer-led fitness classes for every level with Teeter Move! Choose from an expansive library of on-demand classes with any iOS or Android device. 
Our certified trainers make working out fun with classes that vary in length, fitness level, and workout type – including the exclusive Find Your Fit Series. Simplify your fitness routine with these curated programs (3-7x / week) tailored to your specific fitness goal. Simply press play and discover how good exercise can feel.

21 pre-programmed workouts like Cardio, Cruising, Uphill Climb, Fat Burn, Interval, and our goal-oriented series (time, distance, calories, resistance).

items.text:
Hands-Free Entertainment 
The adjustable-height media rack holds your device for clear view of Teeter Move Classes or your favorite shows. Keep your device charged with the integrated USB port.

Every Control in One Place 
Console Quick-Keys provide user-friendly control for your FreeStep including multi-user setting selector, Step-Lock for enter/exit stability, resistance controls, and more.

How do I get started using my Cubii elliptical? 
Simply place your feet on the pedals and start moving! Begin with brief intervals on a low resistance level before increasing resistance and duration. For proper form, find a seat that allows your back to be upright at a 90-degree angle to your legs. 
Will Cubii ellipticals fit under my desk? 
Cubii ellipticals are designed to fit under most desks. For specific dimensions, please refer to the product page for each model. For proper, comfortable use, allow at least 2-3 inches of clearance between the underside of your desk and your knees. 
Can I stand on Cubii ellipticals? 
No. Currently, we only manufacture seated ellipticals. Please do not stand on any Cubii elliptical product. 
How easy is it to move my Cubii elliptical around? 
Cubii ellipticals are designed to be easily moved to wherever you love to sit. Each model varies in transportability with corresponding features such as lightweight construction, carrying handles, and/or built-in wheels.

features: ✅ Versatile Exercise Equipment: The elliptical exercise machine, often referred to simply as an "elliptical", is a versatile piece of exercise equipment designed for home gyms. This exercise machine combines the benefits of treadmills, stationary bikes, and stair climbers so that you can get a full-body workout.

✅ Elliptical Training for All Fitness Levels: Elliptical training machines are well-known for their low-impact nature, making them suitable for individuals of all fitness levels. The elliptical's gliding motion minimizes stress on the joints, making it an excellent choice for those with joint concerns or injuries.

✅ Elliptical Bike Combo Exercise Machine: The combination of an elliptical and a stationary bike in one machine allows users to switch between exercises providing variety in their workouts. One of the standout features of the elliptical exercise machine is its impressive weight capacity, often exceeding 350 pounds.

✅ Elliptical Machine 20 Stride: Adding an elliptical work out equipment for home gym can significantly enhance your fitness routine. With features like variable resistance levels, built-in workout programs, and heart rate monitoring, ellipticals offer a convenient way to reach your fitness goals.

✅100% Satisfaction Guarantee: Our top priority is the comfort of our customers, and we strive to keep them 100% satisfied. By Sunny Health & Fitness 
Pack a cardio workout in the comfort of your own home with the SF-E3912 Pre-Programmed Elliptical Trainer by Sunny Health & Fitness. Stride 15.5 inches when you step onto the wide and textured foot plates. Grab on to the handlebars to engage muscles in your upper body and to maintain balance during your exercise. The Ideal Gift for Your Family 
On this special day, give your family a stepper to make their lives healthier.Use a stepper to express your love and care for your family and make health the common language of the family.Choose a stepper for your family and friends to keep health with them. My parents are older and I am worried that they don’t know how to use the elliptical machine. 
The elliptical machine is already installed and can be used after plugging in. The elliptical machine has a manual mode and three automatic modes, and is equipped with a remote control and an instruction manual, which is easy to operate. 
Will this desk elliptical machine be noisy? 
Our product uses a steel flywheel and a silent motor, so it runs very quietly and will not disturb people around you. 
I have injured my leg. Can I use this electric elliptical machine to assist in rehabilitation? 
Yes, using the elliptical machine for low-impact exercise can prevent fascial adhesion, promote muscle recovery, improve leg effusion and other leg diseases, and assist in rehabilitation after surgery. 
My mother likes to sit and watch TV for a long time. Is it appropriate to buy this elliptical machine for her? 
Very suitable. Using the elliptical machine for low-impact exercise can improve knee joints, promote blood circulation, and improve the physical fitness of the elderly. 
I am too busy at work and don't have time to exercise. Can I use this electric elliptical machine while working? 
This under-desk elliptical machine is very suitable for low-intensity exercise, which can burn fat in the legs, waist and hips and relieve muscle soreness. You can use this elliptical machine to exercise while working.

【LCD Monitor for Tracking Progress】Keep track of your exercise progress with the built-in digital monitor. It displays exercise time, speed, distance, and calories burned, allowing you to monitor your performance easily.

【Space-saving Design】With its compact and sturdy design, this elliptical is ideal for limited spaces. Enjoy high-quality cardio and lower body workouts at home with this leg exerciser while sitting for seniors, and easily store it when not in use.

aPlusContent.title: From the manufacturer
aPlusContent.rawText:
From the manufacturer
InMotion Compact Strider with Cords | Low-impact routine that is gentle to your back, knees, hips, and ankles. 
The Stamina InMotion Compact Strider with Cords offers an effective, full-body workout in any home or office space. It provides an effective, efficient, and quiet cardio and muscle-toning workout. This Pedal Exerciser includes upper body resistance tubes with handles that allow you to work on your arms, back, shoulders, and chest. It helps you burn calories, tone lower-body muscle, and support your endurance, all in a joint-friendly manner. 
Sitting and standing cardio training | Smooth and quiet pedaling 
Whether you are pressed for time, space or both, the InMotion Compact Strider with Cords is your fitness solution. This compact and lightweight desk bike can be used for sitting or standing training, and it’s the perfect fit for the home or office to tone your calves, thighs, and glutes, while getting your heart pumping. Use the pedal in forward or reverse for different leg exercise movements and improved circulation. The adjustable tension allows you to control the intensity of your workout, while the monitor keeps track of your distance, workout time, calories burned and stride count. The non-slip pedals on this desk bike hold your feet in place. 
Upper Body Resistance Bands for a Full Body Workout 
Easy-to-detach upper body resistance bands can also be found on either side of the Compact Strider. You can use these bands for a large variety of exercises and tone your arms, chest, shoulders, back and core muscles. The padded handles keep your hands comfortable and are adjustable if needed. 
This compact elliptical is space-saving, with a profile that is low enough to fit under a desk or table. When you finish your workout, store it or take it with you to its next destination, using the carrying handle. Thanks to the lightweight design (24 pounds) and small footprint (20"x12"), it can be used and taken anywhere with ease. 
Supported by müüv 
Experience connected fitness with this home gym equipment with the müüv app. With smart guided coaching, exercise demo videos, personalized workouts, assembly videos, and more, müüv provides the best workout and fitness experience with your Stamina equipment. Download the müüv app on the Apple App Store or the Google Play store.
